name: Necro
description:
Enter the Necro: Dungeon of Nightmares

Navigate trough randomly generated mazes, avoid traps and destroy juicy monsters.

Collect Dream gems, which will unleash mighty powers. The more types you have, the less power each one of them has.

The Team:

TheRabidDuck1 - Music, Level design

SpaceDinosaur12 - Art, System programming

Design and story were made by both of them.

The project was made in 7 days during the third BTP game jam!
